section.name: Shen Darkeye
section.p: Darkness has always attracted you more than harsh daylight. As a child you practised until your footstep was quieter than a spider's, your touch lighter than a moth's wing. No lock nor vault is proof against your skills. You have learned of the self-styled king of thieves, the Master of Shadows, in the slums of Aku. Perhaps he may present you with a challenge.
You can play as Shen, or as a rogue with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
